name: Bug To Be Defense
description:
This is a strategy oriented defense game where the player will have to defend their own phone from the virus menace. Think, Defend! Attack!

Want to protect your phone, it can only do a good job defensively ready! Game board to the phone as the background, plus the classic defense gameplay, allowing you to easily get started, the game contains multiple challenging barriers, allowing you to experience the excitement of the game fun.

这是一款战略导向的塔防类游戏，玩家将要抵御病毒威胁自己的手机。想要保护好你的手机，那就只有做好防守准备！游戏以手机的电路板为背景，外加经典塔防类的游戏玩法，让你轻松上手，游戏包含多个富有挑战性的关卡，让你体验刺激的游戏乐趣。
